rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile any number of instant or sorcery cards from your graveyard and put a tome counter on them. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card exiled this way.
Menace
Whenever Graduated Protege attacks, put a random card you own in exile with a tome counter on it into your graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
